Welcome to FiChat! 🎉 
Here’s a quick overview of what you can do with FiChat :


🔝 Pin & Prioritize Chats
Pin/Unpin Chats: Easily pin your most important conversations. All your pinned chats will appear at the top section of the chat screen, so you never miss a beat.
Rearrange Pinned Chats: Move your pinned chats around to arrange them by priority, making sure the most crucial conversations are always within easy reach.

🌗 Switch Between Dark & Lite Modes
Whether you prefer a sleek Dark Mode or a clean Lite Mode, you can effortlessly toggle between the two to match your mood or the time of day.

📝 Add Notes Within Chats
Stay organized by adding notes directly within any chat. It’s perfect for keeping track of important details, to-dos, or reminders without leaving the conversation.

👥 Manage Your Experience in the User Panel
Access your dedicated user panel anytime at fc-user.venzpire.cloud to manage your settings, preferences, and more.
We’re here to support you every step of the way. If you have any questions, need assistance, or just want to share feedback, don’t hesitate to reach out to our support team at support@fichat.pro
